To install the lpsolve file and its stuff please run mvn install:install-file -Dfile=CreMA/external/lpsolve55j.jar -DgroupId=net.sf.lpsolve -DartifactId=lp_solve -Dversion=5.5.2 -Dpackaging=jar mvn install:install-file -Dfile=CreMA/external/polco.jar -DgroupId=ch.javasoft.polco -DartifactId=polco -Dversion=4.7.1 -Dpackaging=jar
